this is from a "Police Forums & Law Enforcement Forum", the poll is titled "DO YOU FAVOR AN ARMED CITIZENRY"
 Yes, If they are an adult with no felony or serious mental records. 76 (40%) 
 Yes, If they are an adult with no criminal or mental records. 19 (10%) 
 Yes, If in addition to # 2 they can pass range test and written legal self defense test. 78 (41.05%) 
 Yes, If in addition to #3 they can demonstrate a "compelling need." 6 (3.16% 
 Yes. If in addition to # 4 they pay a substantial "license fee". 5 (2.63%) 
 No, unless they have a current restraining order on someone who is stalking them. 1 (0.53%) 
 No way, not even if they have a restraining order on someone stalking them. 5 (2.63%) 
 http://forums.officer.com/forums/showthread.php?t=73431&page=3
 
 this is proof of nothing, but something i found fascinating.
